website_summaries.verdict: This grilling tripod makes cooking many foods over an open fire a lot easier.
pros: Grill diameter is a little larger than others on the market
Sturdy chain allows you to raise or lower grill to the needed height
Lightweight, but just as sturdy as cast iron tripods
cons: The grill is free swinging, allowing food and pots to be less secure than those hung straight from a chain

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds All Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for camping and cooking over a fire. The adjustable chain and pole lock works very well. I could easily move my full 14" cast iron skillet (photo) up and down simply by grabbing the chain with one hand (no glove or pot holder needed) and release the pole lock with the other and adjust. Raises and lowers the full height. Also, lift two legs and pivot on the third to rotate the entire assembly, with skillet, away from the fire. Very sturdy. Loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Winder

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We took this on a 4 day camping trip and paired it with Rootless Large Portable Outdoor Fire Pit and it worked great. Easy to put together, good size grill, and the fact that it was adjustable up and down allowed us to cook like pro's. We even got creative with some aluminum foil and turned this thing into a little smoker and and had some great ribs. Cleanup was fairly simple and the fact that this folded up into a small package made it nice and portable. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy H Petrie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective
customer_reviews.text: Took a few minutes to set up and only a few additional minutes for me to put a dutch oven on it, that when lowered over heat, the grill surface buckled. It was bent about 20° and broke one of the hooks. I was able to easily bend both back into shape Seems to be made of a pretty inexpensive metal. Under normal loads it worked as advertised. Very easy and straightforward setup.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly wonderful, I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Stansport Grill Tripod Cooker was purchased to use with Rootless Medium 16.5 Inch Portable Outdoor Fire Pit (both purchased here on Amazon) I love the combination, it's light weight, durable, and amazingly no fire sparks or ash blew or dropped off. I'd recommend and give as a gift, I'm very pleased. I did not receive this/these free or at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased product review.
customer_reviews.author: GIGI

customer_reviews.title: Not light and gets dirty, but excellent product for campfire cooking.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is actually pretty heavy at ~6lbs. So, this thing is great for campfires where you can conveniently drive your belongings in, than backpacking/bikepacking. Also the 17.5” grill grate can take up room if you’re trying to pack compactly. In theory, you could use a smaller circular grate if you can get your hands on one. All that said, this grill tripod is one of the greatest group-camping products to exist. It’s perfect for campfire cooking since you can adjust the height of the pan/pot over the fire. The instructions are straightforward. The other heads-up is that the metals will gather a lot of campfire soot. So have those hand wipes handy.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: overall... good bang for buck product
customer_reviews.text: well, on the plus side, it was virtually identical to the ad description listing (albeit a little more light weight in construction that anticipated) ...and it worked well on a far northern ontario canada canoe adventure trip... packed well, easy to set up and take down.. only flaw is that each one of the three failed slightly (not completely) in that inside the poles there is an elastic retention to keep the poles together, and literally each one had a fail on one of the retention strings... not enough to not be usable, but enough to lose pieces of that one leg...
customer_reviews.author: Gary Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Important must have for Walk In/Car Camping
customer_reviews.text: Used many, many times and just recently one of the rubber string pieces that string it together burned off. It doesn’t string together anymore but the poles still connect so it’s still an amazing product for me! I’ve cooked steaks, burgers and so on while camping with this tripod and also have strung my Dutch oven from it a few times for chili and soups. A+ product and extremely useful while camping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Campfire steaks made perfect. I really really like this grill.
customer_reviews.text: Very very useful grilling tripod that appears to be built well enough to give years of service. CAMPFIRE STEAKS MADE PERFECT. Very easy set up and adjustment. While grilling the grill an be rotated around to allow targeted heating to your foods. Turning foods is a two handed job, one to flip and one to hold the grill with a pair of tongs.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kliem

customer_reviews.title: We loved this!
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased this to take on a camping trip to Banff. It was easy to assemble and adjust, sturdy, and had no issues bearing the weight of the things we placed on it. Unfortunately we got snowed out...in June...so we only used it a couple of times. It looked cool though :)
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: I threw it away
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this tripod, but unfortunately, it wasn’t built well. The chain did not slide through the bracket without being manually fed through, and the hole on the metal chain attachment used to adjust the height wasn’t large enough. I could barely get the attachment to slide up and down the pole without a lot of effort, which is not a good situation when cooking over an open fire. I’ve used other tripods before that worked great, so I have to discourage people from buying this one.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great tripod grill!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up and perfect for grilling over an open fire. I love this type of grill setup. Very sturdy and great for camping trips. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Austin

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I docked a star because it came with only half the pieces. I exchanged it, but I bought it just in time for a trip I had planned that weekend, so I didn’t really need it anymore once the replacement finally arrived the following week. I wish there was a chain or something connecting the grill to one of the poles, as it swings around quite a bit. I was also surprised that there is elastic cord in the poles. This makes setup quite easy, but I’m worried about it getting too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee Paakkonen

customer_reviews.title: light weight/ sturdy  & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easily sets up. Very light weight yet sturdy. Packs down into a small package that you could easily slide into some type of bag. I love the rack that comes with it. Can cook multiple things at once. I love the slide to make it high or low.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Practice assembly went fine. Easy to put together especially with the shock ...
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived, right on time. Practice assembly went fine. Easy to put together especially with the shock cord in the legs. May wind up trading out the 3 chain system and round grill for a 4 chain rectangle though. We'll see how long it lasts. I don't know who to talk to about the condition of the box when it arrived. It had been seriously abused. Like they transferred it by a relay system of catapults! There were layers of clear packing tape on all four edges, crinkled corners, and content pressure impressions visible on the outside, but amazingly it still had all the parts, and they had not been crushed, apparently protected by the hand of God himself! Hallelujah!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it folds up , but it needs something to hold the grill to the Legs otherwise when you put your food on or off the grill swings all over the place I bought a package of small chain & connected it to the grill & around the leg of the tripod & back to the grill
customer_reviews.author: Dan Powers

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: Did not go camping again after ordering it for 32 days tried it for the first time and the bungee cords that hold the legs together for easy storage and set up broke first time using it out of the box, now I can’t return it to many days since I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Valerie L. Back

customer_reviews.title: Cooking over the fire is the best
customer_reviews.text: I like to camp and cooking over the fire makes some really good food. This product is super easy to use and I have no issues. I have used it for a couple of years now and is an excellent alternative to a stove.
customer_reviews.author: M Brick

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Light weight and easy!
customer_reviews.text: This worked great! Made pizzas camping two or three times them came out dellish!!! Sturdy and super easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, metal legs surprisingly cool/warm to touch even after cooking.....does not take a rocket scientist to assemble and disassemble....which only takes up the size of a large pizza box at most. Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.author: kiowa kirchoff

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Had to get a file for the hole on the metal piece that allows you to adjust the height of the grill from the fire. It was really hard to move. But after we filed it a bit it w we as good.
customer_reviews.author: alisha fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, we take it camping and cook on this. Better than a grill. You can raise or lower the cooking surface and it has plenty of cooking surface. Easy clean up and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi B Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tripod
customer_reviews.text: Tripod is a very nice lightweight unit. Has a sturdy structure when set properly. The chain lowering system allows you to control the warmth by raising and lowering to the fire
customer_reviews.author: Shane bauer

customer_reviews.title: Makes cooking over an open fire much easier.
customer_reviews.text: Friends had one we all used over the summer so had to get my own. Holds a good amount - eight burgers maybe. Can’t exactly remember but holds more than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Great item and holds up awesome
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this. We use it over the fire a lot. Well worth the money. We grill burgers and steaks on it. We make coffee in our camp pot using it. My hubby uses it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: JJones

customer_reviews.title: Great, Lightweight Tripod with durable rack
customer_reviews.text: I love my tripod! It’s easy to set up, easy to put away. We had another smaller circular rack and managed to clip it onto the metal links above the existing rack so we could cook more food at different temperatures. It’s easy to adjust the height of the rack when it’s over the flame so you can control temperature.
customer_reviews.author: JULIA

customer_reviews.title: Real camping
customer_reviews.text: This little sweetheart is just the addition to your outdoor experience. REAL smoke, outdoor life as it is meant to be.
customer_reviews.author: Neale Povey

customer_reviews.title: A hit of the camping trip
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked great. Super easy set up and it was reliable. We built a massive campfire and plopped this thing on top and cooked all of our food on it. It was sturdy enough to hold a cast iron (as advertised) but the grill also worked well with the food cooked on it directly. Cleaned up and packed up easily. Great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Heiss

customer_reviews.title: Great for Camping
customer_reviews.text: I used to use one of the smaller grates that go right over the firering. After using this i will never go back. It is so much better to be able to raise and lower the pots and be able to pick it up and move it off the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, good for quick packing up, made great burgers and mac n cheese!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas present for my dad and just got back from our first camping trip with it. Easy set up, easy to adjust, makes really good burgers. We had to pack in a hurry and we were able to fold it right up and scoot. Definitely recommend if you like to grill and use a light hanging pot. I wouldn’t reccomend using a heavy duty dutch oven tho. The hooks don’t look like they could support cast iron, but the chain is really strong. Maybe if you replaced the hooks you could use it for that purpose. We used it for hamburgers and mac n cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Cole

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight yet sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Adjusts height easily. Clip on chain comes off to attach to a dutch oven or kettle. Came apart easily and the poles fold up like tent poles.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisU1234488

customer_reviews.title: Girl Scout camp out.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter’s camp out. My wife found it real easy and convienent to set up over the campfire for hotdogs and marshmellows. Not sure how it will handle heavy use but worked well for a basic camp out.
customer_reviews.author: javier lopez

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not made very well. The lever to pull it up and down is super flimsy. Gets the job done but I should have bought a higher quality one.
customer_reviews.author: rosesvengeance

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a great deal for our backyard. Easy assembly but haven't used it yet. I live in WI so in the summer for camping this will be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: Awful assembly from the factory.
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this product one star but would give it zero. Only o e pole is even able to be assembled. The other two poles have two male pieces to to make pieces. It’s impossible to get the clips out to adjust the poles. I wouldn’t take a chance on this if it’s going to come right from the factory like this. I’ll be purchasing a tripod cooking system from another company.
customer_reviews.author: Cassi Anderson

customer_reviews.title: News Flash: Elastic Melts when exposed to heat 🤦🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: Whomever decided that elastic ties should be used to hold the poles together on something that is designed to be over a fire should be fired. However, it is a very nice cooker for the price.... we just can’t disassemble it anymore it due to the elastics melting.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Timmons

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time while camping. Must have for cooking over a fire.
customer_reviews.author: AEE1118

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay
customer_reviews.text: This is not a bad product, it's just inexpensive and as such not great. The biggest problem is that the holding mechanism that holds the chain as you move it up and down is too small, and doesn't allow you to move it very far. I've thought about drilling the hole bigger but that would be a tools challenge for me. A good open bottle opener on the end would serve better.
customer_reviews.author: D. Beau

customer_reviews.title: Good Camping Kit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and to adjust for height above fire. Lightweight and collapsible to a small size. Good for hot dogs, brats, burgers.
customer_reviews.author: otto skorzeny

customer_reviews.title: Missing broken parts
customer_reviews.text: Product is good I have had one before. I opened this one when I went camping and the bungee cord on one of the legs was broken. Missing a leg to it and 2 days out of return window. Probably just get one from the store so I can check it out
customer_reviews.author: Zoe A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: For being so affordable, the product worked great. Just a heads up, the elastic inside the pipes has a tendency to melt. Not really a big dea, but was a little unexpected. For $15 it’s a definite buy. A camping essential...
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B

customer_reviews.title: parts missing
customer_reviews.text: , just poles and grate no anchor, no s hooks, no anchor chain, no support chain, no support hub
customer_reviews.author: Theresa G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This replaced our charcoal grill. Now we sit around a fire while the food is cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Davis

customer_reviews.title: For the outdoorsman that loves to cook over an open fire
customer_reviews.text: If you like to cook over an open fire, then this is the grill to use. It's very easy to use. I will buy another when i wear this out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was great! Only issue is the little slider for the chain gets stuck a lot and the grates a little unstable when you put lighter pots on it. Left it out for a few days in the rain and its totally fine!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Wood

customer_reviews.title: Functions terribly
customer_reviews.text: The anchor chain is too big and catches in the tripod support requiring you to physically adjust the chain and lantern hanger piece. Lantern hanger piece does not fit the leg of the tripod and you have to fight to move it along the pole to change the height of the grill
customer_reviews.author: Mike Fetzer

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose, but flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it serves it's purpose. A little flimsy/cheaply made, but it stands up and allows you to cook over a fire.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Z.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy tripod
customer_reviews.text: Got this s today haven’t used it yet. All th parts were in the box put it together easily. Feels like good quality for the price.feels sturdy when put together
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our camping equipment
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tool for camping. Big enough to cook on for 5 people. At one time I had 8 steaks on. Perfect!!! May replace grill chain to a heavy duty one so I can boil water with my cast iron Dutch oven pan. It's very very heavy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Queen from Ontario, NY

customer_reviews.title: Tripod with a Purpose
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and take down and is great for the cottage or weekend camping. Adjustable grate height for any size fire. I actually put a cast iron skillet on it and it supported it fine as long as weight was distributed evenly so it would not tip.
customer_reviews.author: Ottoman

customer_reviews.title: Works but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Just isn't sturdy enough o work with more than a few people eating.
customer_reviews.author: Mare3.0

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. A lot of parts to lug around. Plus the grill is free hanging so if you are cooking ears of corn be careful so they don't roll off. I'm still looking for a way to affix it to the poles. All in all, it does the job, just takes some effort.
customer_reviews.author: bele232

customer_reviews.title: Good buy but use caution
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty well-made tripod grill for a campfire. Our campfire got too hot on Day 3 of using this during a 3-day camping weekend, and the bungee cord that attaches the rods melted. We can still use this but the rods started rusting really quickly. Additionally, this is a very difficult-to-clean grill.
customer_reviews.author: violinyourface

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product.  Thanks again.
customer_reviews.text: Finally found the one I have been looking for. Easy to set up. Perfect weight. Compact. Sturdy and fairly priced. Can’t wait to use this camping this weekend. Great product. Recommend it to anyone for camping or bon fires.
customer_reviews.author: Luke A Pfister

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is the 2nd one I bought. We use it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Missing crucial pieces
customer_reviews.text: This item was missing over half of the parts. The connectors for the tripod legs, the chain and hook. Very essential pieces to be able to use. Therefore we were unable to use this on our camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Jen aitken

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, grills great, no frills, exactly what we wanted. Got this for our 8 year old son for Christmas who loves everything outdoors. Was a nice "big" gift for a great price. He cooked sausage and eggs (in a pan) on this for Christmas morning:) turned out great!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney W.

customer_reviews.title: Versatility
customer_reviews.text: Great for fire pit grilling in the backyard or camping.
customer_reviews.author: Alabama

customer_reviews.title: Leg was broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Christmas gift, used it for the first time today for the summer, and the leg was broke. Too late to return it since i bought it Christmas time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well but missing part
customer_reviews.text: The grill tripod works well but was sent without the adjusting tab that goes on the leg to move the grate up and down. We tried contacting Stansport and they said they don't have a replacement part and to contact Amazon, but I can only find where to return it. I used it and don't want to return it. I just would like the missing part.
customer_reviews.author: Maura Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Item received damaged-cord in one of the legs
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a nice setup, however the cord in one of the legs is snapped. I am hoping the vendor will see this and send me a new one, or I will have to return it to amazon.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor cooking. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Easily folds away for storage. Perfect for cooking over a fire pit. It’s light weight and study. I cooked 30 wings on it at once. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good Tripod
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this. Easy to assemble. Basket a smidget unstable but it works very well
customer_reviews.author: Becky Ann Walkden

customer_reviews.title: Good for camping
customer_reviews.text: If you want something for weekend camp cooking this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was made out of heavier gauge
customer_reviews.text: It was most useful. But all three legs got bent under a weight of medium sized pot full of soup. Sad :(
customer_reviews.author: Leha D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product- perfect for car camping so we don't have ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product- perfect for car camping so we don't have to use the filthy "built-in" firepit versions. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: josie m.

customer_reviews.title: it's just perfect. Delivery was on time
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to use this when I go camping, it's just perfect. Delivery was on time, and packaging was very good.
customer_reviews.author: gail jamieson

customer_reviews.title: basic
customer_reviews.text: the tubes are spring loaded with a spandex and nylon rope which burned up making the thing clumsy and useless. what a joke.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Koelewyn

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully this one will last longer than my original one I had from Walmart. Time will tell, but so far liking the tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Heather O.

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive but not cheap. The unit held the cast iron crock pot with no issues. Easy to assemble/disassemble and pack up
customer_reviews.author: chris mushall

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The rope inside of the poles that hold it together were all broken, straight out of the box, before I even set it up once.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great prod
customer_reviews.text: Its excellent product only thing could be better would be done kind of carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: Z P

customer_reviews.title: These are great for open fires
customer_reviews.text: These are great for open fires, especially the ones at the provided campgrounds. They only have one temp setting :)
customer_reviews.author: Stu Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a camping trip.... went to use it and I was missing parts ! The top part that holds all the lets together was missing so it's basically useless now. Can't return it because we used the grate already. Really dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit anchor
customer_reviews.text: The anchor does not fit and will have to make the hole bigger just fit on the pole
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for over our firepit.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty sturdy. We used this over our fire pit and out worked out pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the best part of this grill tripod is how easy it ...
customer_reviews.text: With out a doubt, the best part of this grill tripod is how easy it is to clean!!! Setting it up and taking it down takes less 5 minutes. I would definitely recommend this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this zero stars if I could. It didn’t even come with all of the pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.text: Perfect for camping and cooking over the fire... adjusts easily and stores easily out of the way
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy it This thing makes life so much easier
customer_reviews.text: Amazing buy it This thing makes life so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Sly Bryjak

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Leg sections are pulled together by a bungee strap inside the legs and had been cut through by the sharp edges of the tubes by the time I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: really cheap quality.came with missing parts but doubt very seriously that it could hold a pot on it
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Yandell

customer_reviews.title: great quality. Fit over a very large fire pit ...
customer_reviews.text: Works Perfectly, great quality. Fit over a very large fire pit with high walls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: String sucks
customer_reviews.text: One of the strings broke on the legs when I received it. Tried contacting the company and didnt have any luck getting ahold of anyone
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great for the campfire!
customer_reviews.text: Love this gadget. We really only want to campfire cook when camping and this gave us some really great space for making breakfast with a cast iron skillet and dinner in a cast iron pot!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Graziani

customer_reviews.title: This was awesome. We used this so much on our camping ...
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome. We used this so much on our camping trip. It was easy to set up, use and break back down.
customer_reviews.author: Berliner95

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kind of cheesy​, small cooking area so pay attention to size if size matters to you ;)
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I remember, we used to have one many years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S Lemus

customer_reviews.title: NEEDS UPGRADES
customer_reviews.text: A decent set up, but 1 huge prob.. didn't come with the top piece that holds everything together, not to mention the chains are very cheap and are in need of an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non-Camper's Review
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time camping. Very stable. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product but could be a little heavier/stronger material to get a fifth star from me!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Holds my iron pot ( Dutch oven ) Over my fire pit. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Stone 248

customer_reviews.title: Elastic band broke that holds the poles together while putting ...
customer_reviews.text: Elastic band broke that holds the poles together while putting it together for the 1st time, grate isn't very stable, needs to be held by 4 points not 3
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked well.
customer_reviews.text: My cousin purchased the same tripod for our camping trip, and while her's did not have the top piece mine worked fairly well. I would say that the advice to get the heat resistant gloves was spot on, as it allows one to hold the grate and chain, when needed. Yest the grate swings but you will get the hang of it pretty soon; we only lost two hot dogs :-). Cheap and fun experience being our first tripod. Oh, we sprayed the chain part with our olive oil spray to help ease lowering and lifting the grate.
customer_reviews.author: RKW

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: My friends all want one of these for camping since I brought it on a trip. Works great over the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Audra Safter-Myers

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied that the tension for the poles all broke and ...
customer_reviews.text: Not satisfied that the tension for the poles all broke and I have to tape the legs together for it to stay standing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Nice that it's adjustable in height. Highly recommend it for campers.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey lievens

customer_reviews.title: great value.
customer_reviews.text: It is what I expected. For the price, great value.
customer_reviews.author: Breezeon25

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stand makes cooking over camp fire a lot easier
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: ... be using it for hunting this fall it's very easy to set up and very easy to use that ...
customer_reviews.text: The grill served its purpose well I use it for camping and I'm going to be using it for hunting this fall it's very easy to set up and very easy to use that makes cooking so much simpler
customer_reviews.author: Paris Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Get a glove for both hands and thank me later.
customer_reviews.text: This is nice, it is easy to clean and will not rust over night. It can be a little clumsy trying to flip burgers or chicken with it swinging, and it is too hot to grab with your bare hand so if you only have one pit mitt you are not going to have a fun time flipping and holding with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Ray D - Pittsburgh

product_meta.title: Stansport Grill Tripod Cooker(18-Inch)
product_meta.description: Stansport 18 -inch grill tripod cooker has a proven design on the western plains and now available in a lightweight, collapsible steel 15997-77 with all the same features as its iron original with the weight. The adjustable design can be raised or lowered for optimum temperature warming or cooking. It has light weight, shock corded, galvanized steel legs. Its compact design makes it ideal for camping, hunting, or backpacking. 18 -inch grill holds coffee pots, fry pans and a variety of cooking ovens. Quick and easy set up.
feature_bullets: 18 inch grill is adjustable for even cooking
Works well to hang lanterns, water Jugs, and clothing
Adjustable design can be raised or lowered for optimum temperature warming or cooking
Light weight, shock corded, galvanized steel legs
Compact design makes it ideal for camping, hunting, or backpacking, Quick and easy set up
18 -Inch Grill holds coffee pots, fry pans and a variety of cooking ovens
